rukus.text: 92|1|raatri kee shapath, jab chha jaaye
92|2|tatha din kee shapath, jab ujaala ho jaaye
92|3|aur usakee shapath jisane nar aur mada paida kiye
92|4|vaastav mein, tumhaare prayaas alag-alag hain.
92|5|phir jisane daan diya aur bhakti ka maarg apanaaya
92|6|aur bhalee baat kee pooshti karata raha
92|7|to ham usake lie saralata paida kar denge.
92|8|parantu, jisane kanjoosee kee aur dhyaan nahin diya
92|9|aur bhalee baat ko jhuthala diya.
92|10|to ham usake lie kathinaee ko praapt karana saral kar denge.
92|11|aur jab vah gadhe mein girega, to usaka dhan usake kaam nahin aayega.
92|12|hamaara kartavy itana hee hai ki ham seedha maarg dikha den.
92|13|jabaki aalok-paralok hamaare hee haath mein hai.
92|14|mainne tumhen bhadakatee aag se saavadhaan kar diya hai.
92|15|jisamen keval bada hatbhaaga hee jaayega.
92|16|jisane jhuthala diya tatha (saty se) munh pher liya.
92|17|parantu, sanyamee (sadaachaaree) usase bacha liya jaayega.
92|18|jo apana dhan, daan karata hai, taaki pavitr ho jaaye.
92|19|usapar kisee ka koee upakaar nahin, jise utaara ja raha hai.
92|20|vah to keval apane param paalanahaar kee prasannata praapt karane ke lie hai.
92|21|nihsandeh, vah prasann ho jaayega.
